feed.title: Decentralized digital asset exchange with honest pricing and market depth

entry.title: Decentralized digital asset exchange with honest pricing and market depth
entry.summary: In an email conversation, Troy Benjegerdes inquires about developing a multicoin-qt wallet that would run on two blockchains from one binary and allow for trading between the two chains. However, cross-chain trading is different from what he's suggesting and does not offer the same 2-party-trade trick. Peter Todd responds to the email.
